description.value:
Frequency once per hour

You instinctively encode your presence, obscuring your identity and scrambling your visual appearance to technological visual sensors. You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Concealed] to all technological visual sensors, such as security cameras, ocular cybernetic augmentations, and the visual processors of technological constructs, for 1 minute. As the nature of this effect still leaves your location obvious, you can't use this concealment to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Sneak].
